comment: Main body of text in vertical columns, written in traditional Chinese characters, with black ink on aged paper. The text is framed by a thick black border. The content appears to be from a classical Chinese text discussing script systems (e.g., '古文', '篆书', '奇字') and historical figures like Yang Xiong and Qin Shi Huang. The layout follows traditional right-to-left, top-to-bottom reading order.
